miniapp.name: Base Name Radar
miniapp.subtitle: Instant ENS + FName availability
miniapp.tagline: Check ENS and Farcaster names instantly — in one tap.
miniapp.description: Base Name Radar is a tool for checking ENS (.eth) and Farcaster FNames. See availability, ownership, avatars, custody address, timestamps and more — instantly on Base.
miniapp.ogTitle: Base Name Radar — ENS + FName Checker
miniapp.ogDescription: Check ENS and Farcaster names instantly.
